pages.text: The fact that the chickens can have a gray body color is because the gene for the color of the body is equally dominant for white and black, the genes are then called co-dominant. If a chicken has both genes, they will both be expressed.

With the blood there are two things that happen, as before it is clear that the blue blood is a co-dominant gene with the gene for yellow blood and thus together cause green blood. The difference between blue and yellow blood is that there are many more gene combinations that code for the colour of yellow blood.
